help.short: The name of the virtual machine.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="networkAttachments">
<prop type="array" name="placementHints">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="volumeAttachments">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="volumes">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The ETag of the transformation. Omit this value to always overwrite the current resource. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.
Set to '*' to allow a new record set to be created, but to prevent updating an existing resource. Other values will result in error from server as they are not supported.
The name of the virtual machine.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="additionalInfo">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ErrorDetail_read>" name="details" identifiers="message target">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@OperationStatusResult_read>" name="operations">

command.name: create

help.short: The ETag of the transformation. Omit this value to always overwrite the current resource. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.
Set to '*' to allow a new record set to be created, but to prevent updating an existing resource. Other values will result in error from server as they are not supported.
The name of the virtual machine.
The name of the administrator to which the ssh public keys will be added into the authorized keys.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$virtualMachineParameters.properties.networkAttachments" options="network-attachments na" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualMachineParameters.properties.placementHints" options="placement-hints ph" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualMachineParameters.properties.sshPublicKeys" options="ssh-public-keys" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$virtualMachineParameters.properties.storageProfile.volumeAttachments" options="volume-attachments">

help.short: The extended location of the cluster associated with the resource.
The resource ID of the extended location on which the resource will be created.
The extended location type, for example, CustomLocation.
The geo-location where the resource lives
Resource tags.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="networkAttachments" arg="$virtualMachineParameters.properties.networkAttachments">
<prop type="array" name="placementHints" arg="$virtualMachineParameters.properties.placementHints">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys" arg="$virtualMachineParameters.properties.sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="volumeAttachments" arg="$virtualMachineParameters.properties.storageProfile.volumeAttachments">

<prop type="array" name="networkAttachments">
<prop type="array" name="placementHints">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="volumeAttachments">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="volumes">

help.short: The ETag of the transformation. Omit this value to always overwrite the current resource. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.
Set to '*' to allow a new record set to be created, but to prevent updating an existing resource. Other values will result in error from server as they are not supported.
The name of the virtual machine.
The credentials used to login to the image repository that has access to the specified image.
The password or token used to access an image in the target repository.
The URL of the authentication server used to validate the repository credentials.
The username used to access an image in the target repository.
The Azure resource tags that will replace the existing ones.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="networkAttachments">
<prop type="array" name="placementHints">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="volumeAttachments">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="volumes">
